item.description:
Noelle has offered to open her home to both the Wine Group II and White Wine group on Sat, Dec 4 at 7pm.

Please bring a bottle of your favorite Red or White wine. And to create a little fun, please place in a brown paper bag. We'll try to guess each others wines.

If you would like to bring an appetizer, Noelle will coordinate. She can be reached at noelledion@msn.com.


Thanks,
Mike

group.name: The MetroWest White Wine Meetup Group

item.name: Combined Wine Group II and White Wine Group Meeting
